comments.content:
I think I've seen that book elsewhere, but I can't seem to recall where that might have been.   
   
Or I could be completely wrong. That cover page with the guillemets looks pretty familiar, though.

'Spatium' is a nice, little, bilingual type and design magazine..   
Featuring ( type ) designers / type and design related content, worldwide..   
   
( It all began with a PDF only mag, years ago, and evolved into a regulary book style and classy magazine.. )   
   
I love it, because I think that its one of a kind, over here..   
   
_( And if you look closely you will find some of my artworks, featured in some of the previous issues.. )_

Hello,   
we try to publish the magazin in german and english but for the weebsite (at the moment only in german) we not the time to translate.   
   
And like Hrant wrote the next issue is about non-latin typefaces with articles and artworks by Hrant, Tarek Atrissi, oded Ezer, Donald beekmann, Toko, Dirk Uhlenbrock, Panos from [www.fonts.gr](http://web.archive.org/web/20050816110528/http:/www.fonts.gr/) and some people more it will be publishe on June/July (we hope so)   
   
For more question contact us.   
   
bye
